description: It is 2am and Jason walks into a bar at closing time. The hot bartender likes what she see and seduces her customer into the photo booth for a couple of pictures. Before he knows what hit him, he is bound and sucking the bartenders huge cock. Tied up on the pool table Jason gets fucked the way he has fucked so many girls before. How is he going to tell his friends about this one-night-stand?
title: Gia Darling and Jason Renyolds
